creator: ANI
title: 5 platforms providing access to cryptocurrencies beyond Bitcoins to India
dc:creator: ANI
content: It is reasonable that Bitcoin pulled in significant manner in the last few years, there are other currencies like Ethereum, Ripple, Bitcoin Gold etc. which have high potential as well.
